about.title: About Opulanz
about.subtitle: The All-in-One Enterprise Platform
about.storyIntro: Opulanz is part of the Advensys Luxembourg S.A. Group, a holding company with over 19 years of experience providing comprehensive business solutions across Europe. We built Opulanz with a clear vision: to become the European leader in corporate finance.
about.missionText: To improve the ecosystem of business financial services, payments, and operational processes using modern technology including AI and Blockchain.
about.visionText: To become the market leader in online business services in Europe, with financial and brokerage licenses enabling greater flexibility
about.storyClosing: Today, we serve commercial companies, financial institutions, investment funds, and freelancers across Europe. Our experienced team continues to innovate with cutting-edge technology while maintaining the highest standards of security, compliance, and customer service. We represent quality, trust, and innovation in corporate banking.
about.impactSubtitle: Our growth reflects the trust our clients place in us
about.strengthsDescription: Three key pillars of our success
about.strength1Description: Over 19+ years of experience serving commercial companies, financial institutions, and investment funds across Europe.
about.strength2Description: Complete business solution from company formation to financial services, accounting, tax advisory, investment, and insurance.
about.strength3Description: Leveraging Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain to make business financial services better, easier, and more efficient.
about.licensesDescription: We maintain all necessary licenses and certifications to provide business financial services across Europe, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and standards.
about.whyDescription: What makes us your trusted business financial partner
about.benefit1Description: Complete business solution covering company formation, financial services, accounting, tax advisory, investment, insurance, and more - all in one platform.
about.benefit2Description: Part of Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A., we bring nearly two decades of expertise in serving businesses across Europe.
about.benefit3Description: Built with cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain technology to provide efficient, secure, and innovative financial solutions.
about.benefit4Description: Specifically designed for commercial companies, financial institutions, investment funds, and freelancers - not retail banking.
about.benefit5Description: Operating across Europe, we maintain the highest standards of quality, trust, and compliance with financial regulations.
about.benefit6Description: Working towards full banking license with integrated blockchain and green technologies to lead the European online financial services market.
about.ctaDescription: Join thousands of businesses across Europe who trust Opulanz as their all-in-one financial and business solution platform.

disclaimers.heroSubtitle: Important information about our services and limitations
disclaimers.importantNoticeText: Please read these disclaimers carefully. By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these disclaimers.

s1.title: 1. General Disclaimer
s1.text: The information provided on the Opulanz platform is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information accurate and up-to-date, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the platform.

s2.title: 2. Financial Advice Disclaimer
s2.text: The content provided on our platform does not constitute financial, investment, tax, or legal advice. Any information or recommendations provided are for informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional advice. You should consult with qualified professionals before making any financial decisions. Past performance is not indicative of future results.

s3.title: 3. Investment Risk Disclaimer
s3.intro: Investing in financial products involves risk, including the potential loss of principal. Before investing, you should consider:

items.0: Your financial situation, investment objectives, and risk tolerance
items.1: The risks associated with specific investment products

s3.conclusion: We do not guarantee any specific investment returns or outcomes. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions and any resulting gains or losses.

s4.title: 4. Service Availability Disclaimer
s4.text: While we strive to maintain 99.9% uptime, we cannot guarantee uninterrupted or error-free access to our platform. Services may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, technical issues, or circumstances beyond our control. We are not liable for any losses resulting from service interruptions or delays in processing transactions.

s5.title: 5. Third-Party Services Disclaimer
s5.text: Our platform may contain links to or integrate with third-party websites, services, or products. We do not endorse or assume responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party services. Your interactions with third-party services are governed by their respective terms and conditions. We are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from your use of third-party services.

s6.title: 6. Regulatory and Jurisdictional Disclaimer
s6.text: Opulanz operates under licenses and regulations in specific jurisdictions. Our services may not be available in all countries or regions. It is your responsibility to ensure that your use of our services complies with local laws and regulations in your jurisdiction. We make no representation that materials on our platform are appropriate or available for use in all locations.

s7.title: 7. Exchange Rate and Currency Disclaimer
s7.text: Exchange rates displayed on our platform are indicative and may not reflect real-time market rates. Actual rates applied to transactions may differ based on market conditions, transaction size, and timing. Currency exchange involves risk, and rates can fluctuate significantly. We are not responsible for losses resulting from exchange rate movements.

s8.title: 8. Tax Disclaimer
s8.text: Information provided regarding tax matters is general in nature and should not be considered as tax advice. Tax laws vary by jurisdiction and individual circumstances. You are responsible for understanding and complying with your tax obligations. We recommend consulting with qualified tax professionals for advice specific to your situation. Opulanz is not responsible for any tax liabilities you may incur.

s9.title: 9. Insurance Coverage Disclaimer
s9.text: Insurance products offered through our platform are provided by licensed insurance companies. We act as an intermediary and are not the insurance provider. Coverage terms, conditions, and exclusions are determined by the insurance policy documents. You should carefully review all policy documents before purchasing insurance. We are not liable for claims disputes or coverage issues between you and the insurance provider.

s10.title: 10. Company Formation Disclaimer
s10.text: Company formation services are provided for informational and administrative assistance purposes only. We do not provide legal advice regarding corporate structure, governance, or compliance. The suitability of a particular corporate structure depends on your specific circumstances and objectives. You should consult with legal and tax professionals before forming a company.

s11.title: 11. Security Disclaimer
s11.text: While we implement industry-standard security measures, no system is completely secure. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. We are not liable for unauthorized access resulting from your failure to maintain security, disclosure of credentials, or use of compromised devices or networks.

s12.title: 12. Transaction Disclaimer
s12.text: Once a transaction is executed, it may not be reversible. You are responsible for verifying all transaction details before confirming. We are not liable for losses resulting from incorrect recipient information, amount errors, or transactions executed based on your instructions. Some transactions may be delayed or rejected due to compliance reviews, technical issues, or insufficient funds.

s13.title: 13. Content Accuracy Disclaimer
s13.text: We make reasonable efforts to ensure information accuracy, but content on our platform may contain errors, omissions, or outdated information. Account balances, transaction history, and other data are provided "as is" without warranty. You should verify critical information independently. We reserve the right to correct errors and update information without prior notice.

s14.title: 14. Limitation of Liability
s14.text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Opulanz, its directors, employees, partners, and affiliates shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from: your use or inability to use our services, unauthorized access to your account, errors or omissions in content, delays or interruptions in service, or any decisions made based on information provided on our platform.

s15.title: 15. Changes to Disclaimers
s15.text: We reserve the right to modify these disclaimers at any time. Material changes will be communicated through our platform or via email. Your continued use of our services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated disclaimers. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.

s16.title: 16. Contact Information
s16.intro: If you have questions about these disclaimers, please contact us:
s16.address: 1 Avenue de la Liberté, L-1931 Luxembourg

yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.text: Request a copy of your personal data

erasure.label: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten):

portability.label: Right to Data Portability:
portability.text: Receive your data in a machine-readable format

object.label: Right to Object:
object.text: Object to certain types of processing

restriction.label: Right to Restriction of Processing:
restriction.text: Limit how we use your data

contactDPO.title: Contact for Data Protection
contactDPO.intro: To exercise your rights or for any questions regarding data protection, please contact us:

cookies.text: We use Google Analytics to analyze website usage and improve our services. This involves collecting IP addresses and website navigation data.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.text: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. We recommend that you review this page periodically to stay informed of any changes.

regulatory.heroSubtitle: Our commitment to compliance and regulatory oversight
regulatory.intro: Opulanz operates under strict regulatory oversight to ensure the highest standards of financial integrity, client protection, and operational transparency.

framework.title: Regulatory Framework
framework.intro: Opulanz is regulated by leading European financial authorities. Our operations comply with:

items.mifid: Markets in Financial Instruments Directive (MiFID II)
items.banking: Banking and financial services regulations in France

acpr.description: The French Prudential Supervision and Resolution Authority supervises banks, insurance companies, and financial institutions operating in France.

amf.description: The French Financial Markets Authority regulates financial markets, investment services, and protects investors.

compliance.title: Compliance Standards
compliance.intro: We maintain the highest compliance standards across all aspects of our operations:

aml.title: Anti-Money Laundering (AML)
aml.text: We implement comprehensive AML policies and procedures to detect and prevent money laundering activities. This includes ongoing transaction monitoring, suspicious activity reporting, and staff training programs.

kyc.title: Know Your Customer (KYC)
kyc.text: All clients undergo thorough identity verification and due diligence procedures. We collect and verify personal information, beneficial ownership details, and source of funds to ensure regulatory compliance.

ctf.title: Counter-Terrorist Financing (CTF)
ctf.text: We screen all clients and transactions against international sanctions lists and watchlists to prevent terrorist financing and comply with international security regulations.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.text: We comply with GDPR and implement robust data protection measures to safeguard your personal information. Your data is processed lawfully, transparently, and securely.

clientFunds.title: Client Fund Protection
clientFunds.text: Client funds are held in segregated accounts with licensed banking partners and are protected according to applicable deposit guarantee schemes. Your funds are kept separate from company operational funds.

licenses.title: Licenses and Authorizations
licenses.intro: Opulanz holds the necessary licenses and authorizations to provide financial services:

banking.title: Banking Services - France
banking.supervised: Licensed and supervised by ACPR (Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution)
banking.text: Our French banking operations are fully compliant with French banking law and European banking directives.

investment.title: Investment Services - France
investment.regulated: Regulated by AMF (Autorité des Marchés Financiers)
investment.text: Our investment advisory services comply with MiFID II regulations and AMF requirements.

payment.title: Payment Services
payment.text: We provide secure payment services across the European Economic Area in compliance with PSD2 requirements.

questions.title: Questions About Our Regulatory Status?
questions.text: For inquiries about our licenses, compliance procedures, or regulatory matters, please contact our compliance team.

FR.banking: Opulanz is a digital banking platform. Banking services are provided by licensed partners regulated by ACPR (Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution).
FR.investment: Investment services are subject to MiFID II regulations and provided by advisors authorized by AMF (Autorité des Marchés Financiers).
FR.insurance: Insurance distribution is subject to IDD (Insurance Distribution Directive) requirements. Opulanz acts as an insurance intermediary.
FR.mortgage: Mortgage services are provided by licensed credit intermediaries. Subject to responsible lending requirements.

LU.banking: Banking services are provided by licensed and regulated partners.
LU.investment: Investment advisory services comply with Luxembourg law and MiFID II regulations.
LU.insurance: Life insurance products distributed in compliance with Luxembourg insurance law and IDD requirements.
LU.mortgage: Mortgage services provided by regulated credit institutions in Luxembourg. Subject to consumer protection laws.

story.title: Transforming Business Banking
story.intro: Opulanz is part of Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A., a holding company with over 18+ years of experience in providing comprehensive business solutions across Europe. We built Opulanz with a clear vision: to become the leader in European online banking for businesses.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To improve the ecosystem of business banking, payments, and operational processes using modern technology including AI and Blockchain.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leaders of the European online banking market with full banking license and integrated blockchain technologies.

story.summary: Today, we serve commercial companies, financial institutions, investment funds, and freelancers across Europe. Our experienced team continues to innovate with cutting-edge technology while maintaining the highest standards of security, compliance, and customer service. We represent quality, trust, and innovation in business banking.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions

openAccount.question: How long does it take to open an account?
openAccount.answer: Individual accounts can be opened within 24-48 hours after document verification. Business accounts typically take 3-5 business days.

documents.question: What documents do I need to open an account?
documents.answer: For individual accounts: valid passport or ID card, proof of address (utility bill or bank statement), and source of funds documentation. For business accounts: company registration documents, beneficial owner information, and business plan.

fees.question: Are there any monthly fees?
fees.answer: We offer transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Monthly fees vary by account type. Individual accounts start from €10/month, and business accounts from €25/month.

currencies.question: Which currencies do you support?
currencies.answer: We support EUR, USD, GBP, CHF, and other major currencies. Multi-currency IBANs are available for all account types.

contact.question: How can I contact support?
contact.answer: You can reach us via phone at +352 20 30 40 50, email at support@opulanz.com, or live chat during business hours (Mon-Fri, 9:00-18:00 CET).

insurance.title: Luxembourg Life Insurance Application
insurance.description: Complete your application in 7 comprehensive steps

policyholderTax.title: Policyholder Information
policyholderTax.subtitle: Please provide your personal details and tax residency information.
policyholderTax.taxResidentLU: I am a tax resident of Luxembourg
policyholderTax.taxResidentLUDesc: Check this if you are liable to pay taxes in Luxembourg
policyholderTax.fatcaText: Luxembourg life insurance companies are required to report to tax authorities under FATCA (US) and CRS (OECD) regulations. Please ensure all tax residency information is accurate and complete.

financialProfile.title: Financial Profile
financialProfile.subtitle: Help us understand your financial situation and the source of funds for this investment.
financialProfile.totalAssetsDesc: Include all assets: savings, investments, property, business interests, etc.
financialProfile.liquidAssetsDesc: Assets readily convertible to cash: bank accounts, stocks, bonds, etc.
financialProfile.sourceOfFundsLabel: Source of Funds for This Investment *
financialProfile.sourceOfFundsDesc: Where will the money for the insurance premium come from?
financialProfile.sourceOfFundsDetailsPlaceholder: Provide details about the source of funds
financialProfile.sourceOfWealthDesc: How did you accumulate your overall wealth?
financialProfile.sourceOfWealthDetailsPlaceholder: Provide details about the source of wealth
financialProfile.pepNo: I am not a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
financialProfile.pepYes: I am a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
financialProfile.pepInfoText: A Politically Exposed Person is an individual who holds or has held a prominent public function, such as a head of state, senior politician, senior government official, judicial or military official, senior executive of a state-owned corporation, or important political party official. Family members and close associates of PEPs are also considered PEPs.
financialProfile.pepDetailsPlaceholder: Describe your political position, role, or relationship to a PEP
financialProfile.amlText: This information is required under Luxembourg and EU Anti-Money Laundering regulations. All data provided will be kept confidential and used solely for compliance purposes.

investmentProfile.title: Investment Profile
investmentProfile.subtitle: Help us understand your investment experience and objectives to recommend suitable products.
investmentProfile.warningHighRiskShort: Your high risk tolerance may not align with your short investment horizon. Consider adjusting your approach.
investmentProfile.warningLowRiskLong: A conservative risk approach with a long investment horizon may limit potential returns.

horizon.title: Investment Horizon *
horizon.shortDesc: I may need access to my funds within 3 years
horizon.mediumDesc: I can invest for 3-7 years without needing access
horizon.longDesc: I can invest for 7 years or more without needing access

knowledge.title: Investment Knowledge *
knowledge.noneDesc: I have little to no knowledge of investment products
knowledge.basicDesc: I understand basic investment concepts (stocks, bonds, funds)
knowledge.goodDesc: I have good knowledge of various investment products and strategies
knowledge.advancedDesc: I have extensive knowledge and experience with complex investment products

experience.title: Investment Experience *
experience.limitedDesc: I have invested occasionally or for a short period
experience.moderateDesc: I have been actively investing for 2-5 years
experience.extensiveDesc: I have been actively investing for over 5 years

riskTolerance.title: Risk Tolerance *
riskTolerance.description: How much risk are you willing to take with your investment? Higher risk can lead to higher potential returns, but also higher potential losses.

objective.title: Investment Objective *
objective.preservationDesc: Protect my capital with minimal risk, accepting lower returns
objective.incomeDesc: Generate regular income from my investments
objective.balancedDesc: Balance growth and income with moderate risk
objective.growthDesc: Maximize long-term capital appreciation, accepting higher volatility
objective.aggressiveDesc: Seek maximum returns with high risk tolerance

liquidity.title: Liquidity Needs *
liquidity.high: High - I may need access to funds soon
liquidity.medium: Medium - I might need partial access in a few years
liquidity.low: Low - I don't need access to these funds

investmentProfile.mifidText: This questionnaire helps us assess whether our products are suitable for you based on your investment knowledge, experience, objectives, and financial situation, as required by EU MiFID II regulations.

premiumPayments.title: Premium & Payments
premiumPayments.subtitle: Choose your premium structure and provide payment details.
premiumPayments.currencyDesc: All premiums and payouts will be denominated in this currency
premiumPayments.bankTransferSingleDesc: One-time wire transfer from your bank account
premiumPayments.paypalSingleDesc: Pay securely with PayPal, debit or credit card
premiumPayments.paypalRegularDesc: Set up recurring payments via PayPal
premiumPayments.accountHolderPlaceholder: Full name as it appears on the account
premiumPayments.accountHolderDesc: Must match the policyholder name for AML compliance
premiumPayments.sepaText: By providing your bank details, you authorize us to automatically debit your account for regular premium payments. You can cancel this authorization at any time.
premiumPayments.checkInstructionsPayable: Please make the check payable to "Opulanz Life Luxembourg S.A." and send it to:
premiumPayments.checkInstructionsMemo: Include your application reference number on the check memo line.
premiumPayments.securePaypalDesc: You will be redirected to PayPal to complete your payment securely. You can pay with your PayPal balance, bank account, or credit/debit card.
premiumPayments.paymentVerificationDesc: After completing your PayPal payment, you will receive a confirmation email. Your application will be processed once the payment is verified.
premiumPayments.importantNoteText: Premium payments must originate from an account in the policyholder's name. Third-party payments may not be accepted due to anti-money laundering regulations.

beneficiaries.title: Beneficiaries
beneficiaries.subtitle: Designate who will receive the policy proceeds in the event of your death.
beneficiaries.beneficiaryTypeDesc: Primary beneficiaries receive proceeds first. Contingent beneficiaries receive proceeds if all primary beneficiaries predecease you.
beneficiaries.percentageMustEqual100: The total percentage must equal 100%. Currently {direction} {difference}%
beneficiaries.primaryDesc: Receive policy proceeds first according to their percentage allocation.
beneficiaries.contingentDesc: Only receive proceeds if all primary beneficiaries have predeceased you.
beneficiaries.percentageRule: The total percentage for all primary beneficiaries must equal 100%, as must the total for all contingent beneficiaries (if any).
beneficiaries.updateAnytime: You can update beneficiaries at any time during the life of the policy.
beneficiaries.importantNoteText: If you do not name a beneficiary, or if no named beneficiaries survive you, the proceeds will be paid to your estate. We recommend consulting with a legal or tax advisor when making beneficiary designations, especially for complex family situations or international beneficiaries.

compliance.title: Compliance & Declarations
compliance.subtitle: Please review and confirm the following declarations and upload required documents.

docs.addressName: Utility bill or bank statement (less than 3 months old)
docs.sofName: Bank statements, payslips, or other evidence

compliance.uploadLaterDesc: You can proceed with your application and upload documents via email or secure portal. Your application will remain pending until all documents are received.

health.label: Health Declaration *
health.text: I declare that I am in good health and have no knowledge of any medical condition that may affect my life expectancy. I understand that false declarations may void the policy.

accuracy.label: Accuracy of Information *
accuracy.text: I declare that all information provided in this application is true, complete, and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I will notify the insurer of any changes to this information.

taxCompliance.label: Tax Compliance *
taxCompliance.text: I confirm that I am in compliance with all applicable tax laws and regulations in my country(ies) of tax residence. I understand my obligation to report this policy to relevant tax authorities as required.

aml.label: Anti-Money Laundering Declaration *
aml.text: I declare that the funds used for premium payments are from legitimate sources and are not proceeds from illegal activities. I understand that the insurer may conduct ongoing monitoring for AML/CFT purposes.

dataProcessing.label: Data Processing Consent *
dataProcessing.text: I consent to the processing of my personal data by Opulanz Life Luxembourg S.A. and its service providers for the purpose of administering this insurance policy, in accordance with GDPR and Luxembourg data protection laws.

terms.label: Terms and Conditions *
terms.textBefore: I have read, understood, and agree to the
terms.textAfter: , including all fees, charges, and investment risks.

eSignature.label: Electronic Signature Consent *
eSignature.text: I agree that my electronic submission of this application constitutes my legal signature and has the same binding effect as a handwritten signature.

marketing.label: Marketing Communications (Optional)
marketing.text: I consent to receive marketing communications about products and services that may be of interest to me. You can unsubscribe at any time.

compliance.regulatoryText: This application is subject to Luxembourg insurance regulations and EU directives including Solvency II, IDD (Insurance Distribution Directive), and GDPR. All declarations are legally binding.
compliance.coolingOffText: Luxembourg law provides a 30-day cooling-off period from policy issuance. You may cancel the policy within this period and receive a full refund of premiums paid, subject to market value adjustments for unit-linked policies.

reviewSubmit.title: Review & Submit
reviewSubmit.subtitle: Please review your information before submitting your application.
reviewSubmit.submitError: An error occurred while submitting your application. Please try again or contact support.
reviewSubmit.beforeSubmitText: By submitting this application, you confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete. You also acknowledge that you have read and agreed to all declarations and terms and conditions.

landing.heroSubtitle: Access carefully selected European real estate opportunities through professionally managed Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) structures, available exclusively to qualified investors.

whatIsSpv.title: What is an SPV?
whatIsSpv.description: A Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) is a dedicated legal entity created specifically to hold and manage a real estate asset. Each SPV isolates the investment, providing clear legal separation, professional governance, and transparent reporting for investors.

protection.title: Asset Protection
protection.description: Each SPV isolates the property asset, shielding investors from unrelated liabilities.

governance.title: Professional Governance
